title: Complex Sine Function
description: The function CSIN calculates the sine of a complex number. It takes a complex number as input and computes both the real and imaginary parts of the result using hyperbolic sine and cosine functions.
name: CSIN

input.name: X
input.description: A complex number input for which the sine is to be calculated.

return_value.description: The sine of the complex input X, returned as a complex number.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the sine result.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the sine result.
